talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am grateful to you for driving out the
trespassers. I was <clr:0000>processing zonaite<clr:ffff>
into other materials.<sp:0:4:0>It was necessary that I flee to avoid
detection. <sp:5:0:0>But I am at liberty now to trade
<clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> for processed materials.
talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am grateful to you for driving out the
trespassers. It was necessary that I flee
to avoid detection.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But let us speak no more of that.
